fields.fieldTitle: Name of person offering the product or service?

fieldHint.hint1: "______ is the name of the person who is offering the product / service, etc."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: author, coach, entrepreneur, business owner, etc.

fieldHint.hint1: "The main topic of my product / service is ______."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: sales funnels, sales copy writing, book writing, etc.

fieldHint.hint1: "My audience is interested in ________." (VERB ending in ING)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: writing a book, building a funnel, writing sales copy, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Name/ title of product/ service you're doing the case study for?

fieldHint.hint1: "The name of the product / service, etc. is _______."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: Click Funnels, Funnel Scripts, Insider's Club, Funnel University

fields.fieldTitle: What is the "thing" you want a case study about?

fieldHint.hint1: "The thing I want a case study about is a _______."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: product, coaching program, software, book, etc.
